title: Patatas bravas
ingredients: ['1.5kg potatoes, peeled and cubed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves of garlic, finely chopped', '1 or 2 teaspoons of hot chilli powder to taste', '1 teaspoon Spanish paprika', '6 ripe tomatoes, chopped (or 400g tin of tomatoes)', 'about 100ml of water (if using fresh tomatoes)', '1 tablespoon wine, white or red (or wine vinegar)', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
